revised_title: Thomas Ralph Merton: A Life of Science and Accomplishments
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life of Thomas Ralph Merton, a scientist, inventor, and connoisseur of the fine arts. Merton made significant contributions to spectroscopy and astrophysics, with a focus on experimental techniques and accurate measurements. He also served in World War I and had a fulfilling personal life with his wife and five sons.
